description:
A school race pits class against class in cross-country race. Kurumi and friends must navigate treacherous terrain—while the Magumi students just fly over everything obstacle. Can Standard Class 1 finish the race, let alone win it?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Walk My Butt Off in This Cross-Country Race!
私, 強歩大会で歩きまくりまーす!
